subject: Zenyatta (Race Horse)
lead_paragraph: John Shirreffs, the trainer of the Breeders’ Cup Classic winner Zenyatta, says he will send out another one of his star females to challenge a field made up mostly of boys in the $10 million Dubai World Cup.
snippet: John Shirreffs, the trainer of the Breeders’ Cup Classic winner Zenyatta, says he will send out another one of his star females to challenge a field made up mostly of boys in the $10 million Dubai World Cup.
